title: Get 40% off 12 bottles from The Great Wine Company!
content:
Bring the taste of Italy to your home with this exclusive deal from The Great Wine Company. For just £74.99 (plus £9.99 delivery) you’ll receive an Italian Pinot Grigio and Prosecco 12-pack – the RRP is £140.20, so that’s a huge saving of £64.21, with each bottle coming in at an amazing £6.33. Just be quick to take advantage of this offer, as there are only a limited number of cases available!

Get 40% off now

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

This Italian Pinot Grigio and Prosecco 12-pack from The Great Wine Company includes:

– Eleven bottles of Puiattino Pinot Grigio 2019. Pale in colour, this wine has fresh grassy notes and hints of green apples. The palate has a touch of honeyed richness but is fresh and steely, making it a wonderful aperitif.

– One bottle of Prosecco NV Stelle d’Italia. A lively crisp Prosecco with a delicate lemony character and an aromatic, dry, refreshing finish.

With The Great Wine Company, you can be sure that what you’ve ordered will be good. A company run by wine people, their mission is to introduce you to the people who craft this wonderful drink with care, attention and passion. By doing so, they want to foster connections, share enjoyment and encourage enthusiasm.

The team at The Great Wine Company bring you the full, kaleidoscopic picture of vineyards, places and people. And, in our seasonal world, they’ll bring you what’s good on the day, and point you to the right wines for the season’s flavours. They know that great wine experiences are personal, so they’ll always put you, the wine drinker first.
